vsParam: Peppermint

[px], have you packed the medicines?
Don't forget the apple, it'll be my snack.
Sorel

Ah, [px], I've heard of it,
Bergamot Sensei gave you an assignment?
Peppermint

Er, yes.
Sensei wants us to kill the monster and collect materials.
Cresson

Hmm... But, fighting a monster is not the
strong suit of an alchemist, is it?
Cresson

We guards are here
to do these things...
This is about finding out the properties of the materials.
We must do it to become the most powerful alchemist!
Cresson
Properties of... materials?
Sorel

Yes. We are going to kill the monster and collect materials
just to find out the properties of those materials.
Cresson

I see... I didn't realize that alchemists also need
combat capability! Okay, I must not lose, either!
Sorel

Hey, what nonsense! We just want to figure out the
properties of materials by hunting down the monster
and collecting the materials ourselves!
Anis Hyssop

Alchemy is a technology that alters properties of things.
So an alchemist must know the materials' properties very well.
Anis Hyssop

And the materials come from monsters. That's why an
alchemist must fight the monsters to learn their properties,
especially during school-days.
Peppermint

Ah, uh, that's right!
Bergamot Sensei said the same thing!
Cresson

Oh, I understand...
Okay, I got it!
Cresson

In order for [px] to study the
monsters' properties, I will do my utmost to assist you!
Peppermint

Will you... It sounds very nice, but don't make
[px] assist you when the time comes.
Cresson

No, no such thing will happen. Ha-ha-ha!
Let's go kill some monsters!
